original_text: Their bones are like sticks made of bronze. Their legs are as strong as iron. Their bones are like sticks made of bronze. Their legs are as strong as iron. Their bones are like sticks made of bronze.
korean_text: 그 뼈는 놋관 같고 그 뼈대는 쇠 막대기 같으니

sentences.original_text: Their bones are like sticks made of bronze.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 뼈는 청동으로 만든 막대기 같다.

sentences.original_text: Their legs are as strong as iron.
Their bones are like sticks made of bronze.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 뼈는 청동으로 만든 막대기 같다.
